title: Functional Workflows - ObserverOne Data Observability Platform (Meta)
description: Explore AI-driven automation for end-to-end data observability at Meta — from real-time anomaly detection to automated remediation and governance.

modules.functionalOverview: Autonomously monitors schema, freshness, completeness, and accuracy of data streams across Meta’s large-scale pipelines.

features.title: Schema Drift Detection
features.detail: Detects unexpected schema changes in real time

features.title: Freshness Monitoring
features.detail: Identifies delayed data arrivals against defined SLAs

features.title: Completeness Checks
features.detail: Flags missing or incomplete records across streams

features.title: Accuracy Validation
features.detail: Cross-verifies data against golden sources or baselines

benefits: 🚀 70% faster detection of corrupted or missing data
✅ Higher trust in dashboards and AI models
modules.mermaid:
graph TD
Start([Ingest Data from Pipelines]) --> Schema[Schema Drift Check]
Start --> Freshness[Freshness SLA Check]
Start --> Completeness[Completeness Validation]
Start --> Accuracy[Accuracy Cross-check]
Schema --> Alerts[Generate Alerts if Issues]
Freshness --> Alerts
Completeness --> Alerts
Accuracy --> Alerts
Alerts --> Memory[Update Contextual Memory & RCA Agent]
Alerts --> Supervisor[Escalate to Supervisor Agent if Critical]

modules.functionalOverview: Detects anomalies in data volume, distribution, and patterns using AI/ML models and semantic similarity search.

features.title: Unsupervised Anomaly Detection
features.detail: Identifies unusual trends without labeled training data

features.title: Contextual Baselines
features.detail: Learns seasonal patterns and workload cycles at Meta-scale

features.title: Semantic Search
features.detail: Uses Faiss-based RAG to detect similar past anomalies

features.title: Adaptive Thresholds
features.detail: Dynamically adjusts sensitivity to reduce false positives

modules.mermaid:
flowchart TD
Start([Monitor Metrics, Logs, Events]) --> Detect[Run ML-based Anomaly Detection]
Detect --> Baseline[Compare Against Historical Baselines]
Baseline -->|Normal| Store[Log in Contextual Memory]
Baseline -->|Anomaly| Faiss[Semantic Search in Vector DB]
Faiss --> Match{Match Found?}
Match -- Yes --> RCA[Send to RCA Agent with Context]
Match -- No --> NewPattern[Store as New Pattern in Memory]
RCA --> Supervisor[Escalation if Critical]

modules.functionalOverview: Leverages knowledge graphs and contextual memory to trace dependencies across pipelines, identify failure points, and provide actionable insights.

features.title: Lineage Graph Traversal
features.detail: Uses Neo4j to trace upstream and downstream dependencies

features.title: Cross-Pipeline Correlation
features.detail: Identifies cascading failures across interlinked pipelines

features.title: Historical Context
features.detail: Fetches past incidents with similar signatures

features.title: Impact Analysis
features.detail: Evaluates downstream business or AI model impact

modules.mermaid:
graph TD
Start([Anomaly or DQ Alert]) --> Neo4j[Traverse Data Lineage in Neo4j]
Neo4j --> Trace[Identify Upstream & Downstream Dependencies]
Trace --> Correlate[Correlate with Other Affected Pipelines]
Correlate --> Context[Fetch Historical Incidents from Memory]
Context --> Impact[Analyze Downstream Impact on Dashboards & AI Models]
Impact --> Report[Generate RCA Report for Remediation Agent]
Report --> Supervisor[Escalate if SLA Impact]

modules.functionalOverview: Executes automated playbooks for common data failures, enabling rapid recovery with minimal human intervention.

features.title: Policy-Driven Remediation
features.detail: Executes predefined actions based on issue severity

features.title: Rollback & Restart
features.detail: Automates rollback of bad data or pipeline restart

features.title: Playbook Orchestration
features.detail: Runs containerized remediation workflows

features.title: Escalation Triggers
features.detail: Engages human-in-the-loop if policy thresholds exceeded

benefits: 📑 Full audit trail of remediation actions
modules.mermaid:
flowchart TD
Start([RCA Report Available]) --> Check{Issue Severity}
Check -- Low --> AutoFix[Run Automated Remediation Playbook]
Check -- Medium --> Rollback[Rollback / Restart Pipelines]
Check -- High --> Escalate[Escalate to Human-in-Loop]
AutoFix --> Log[Update Contextual Memory & Compliance Logs]
Rollback --> Log
Escalate --> Supervisor[Supervisor Agent Oversight]
Supervisor --> Log

modules.functionalOverview: Provides unified monitoring, governance, and oversight across all observability agents with full auditability.

features.title: Execution Graph Monitoring
features.detail: Tracks workflows in LangGraph with real-time status

features.title: Fallback & Resilience
features.detail: Re-routes tasks if agents fail or stall

features.title: Unified Dashboard
features.detail: Visualizes incidents, RCA, remediation, and lineage

features.title: Compliance Logging
features.detail: Maintains audit trails for regulatory requirements

modules.mermaid:
graph TD
Start([All Agents Running]) --> LangGraph[Monitor LangGraph Execution Graph]
LangGraph --> Status[Track Agent Health & Failures]
Status -->|Failure| Fallback[Trigger Fallback Mechanism]
Status -->|Success| Dashboard[Update Supervisor Dashboard]
Fallback --> Dashboard
Dashboard --> Logs[Write Compliance & Audit Logs]
Logs --> End([Supervisor Oversight Complete])
